name: Alia Bhatt: Star Life
description:
Start from the bottom and rise to the top, be a Bollywood A-list star in Alia Bhatt: Star Life - Experience fame, fortune, fashion and lots of masala with your best friend, Alia Bhatt!

Live the Star Life:
Alia Bhatt is your best friend and she’ll show you the ropes of the Hindi film industry. Star in advertisements, TV shows and movie roles on your way to fame - who knows, you might one day star in your own blockbuster! Let Alia Bhatt teach you to act, dance and sing like a star. Hit the hottest parties with the hottest celebrities at the most happening clubs and restaurants all over India and the world!

Handle all the Fashion and Nautanki:
Wear the most fashionable outfits as you work with the industry’s top designers on their collections and fashion shows. Become a bigger star to unlock exclusive fashions that boost your style quotient. Of course your rivals will be jealous... you'll have to manage your stardom as you handle the gossip and drama from star rivals.

Hire a publicist and manager to help you navigate press interviews and media spotlights - beat everyone else and be the top star!

We may use various types of information available on the device along the likes of Device-Identifier(s) and/or other locally stored account names in order to detect fraudulent or abusive behaviour among users only.

Your location information may be used to provide custom location specific features of the game to enhance your experience in the game.

This app may require permissions to write on your SD Card or external storage in order to save device space.
